text: @realDonaldTrump @seanhannity 131,725 horrid #American #COVID19 #Deaths on YOUR watch & YOU prattle on about how an anonymous “they” want to make YOU look bad. YOU “look trrrible” [sic] because YOU can’t spell or use spell checker & don’t have a #Federal Testing & Tracking Plan to protect us from #COVID19.
